trans-unit.target:
Group Pose<tab>Perform a group pose, repeating the last executed emote or action on loop. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Text Command: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>/grouppose <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Key Mapping: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Available

Idling Camera<tab>Enable the idling camera. While active, the idling camera will randomly toggle between nearby PCs and NPCs. Executing the command with a PC or NPC targeted will center the camera on that target. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Text Command: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>/idlingcamera <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Key Mapping: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Available

Alarm<tab>Enable alarm. Alarms can be set to go off while in game and are deleted upon logout.
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Text Command: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>/alarm <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Key Mapping: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Available
